raw_snippet: 225 they are perhaps their most formidable, mounted on vehicles and giant robots, or as heavy, tripod mounted machineguns. Vehicles Commonly The loudness of the weapons, other than the glitter boy's Boom Gun, used by Adventurers has been mechanically suppressed, but are still terribly loud (about equal to 85 decibels) and gun operators must still wear protective headgear to muffle the sound. Prolonged operation of a rail gun without a sound suppressor will cause permanent damage to the ears and eventual deafness. Many military rail gun operators have cybernetic sound filt- ration systems installed.
